00075 SBW_API sbwDataBlockWriter::sbwDataBlockWriter()
00076 {
00077     end = 0;
00078     dataLength = 1000;
00079     data = new unsigned char[1000]; 
00080 }
00081 
00086 SBW_API sbwDataBlockWriter::sbwDataBlockWriter(Integer x)
00087 {
00088     end = 0;
00089     dataLength = x;
00090     data = new unsigned char[x];
00091 }
00092 
00096 SBW_API sbwDataBlockWriter::~sbwDataBlockWriter()
00097 {
00098         delete[] data ;
00099 }
00100 
00105 SBW_API void sbwDataBlockWriter::dump()
00106 {
00107         int byte = 0 ;
00108 
00109         printf("\n");
00110         while (byte != end)
00111         {
00112                 printf("%d ", data[byte]);
00113                 byte++ ;
00114         }
00115 
00116         printf("\n");
00117 }
00118 
00124 SBW_API void sbwDataBlockWriter::makeSpace(int space)
00125 {
00126         dataLength = (end + space) * 2;
00127 
00128         unsigned char *newData = new unsigned char[dataLength];
00129         
00130         memcpy(newData, data, end);
00131         delete[] data ;
00132         data = newData ;
00133 }
00134 
00139 SBW_API void sbwDataBlockWriter::packWithoutType(const DataBlockWriter writer)
00140 {
00141         Integer items = 0;
00142         DataBlockReader reader = writer.getReader();
00143 
00144         while (reader.getNextType() != TerminateType)
00145         {
00146                 reader.skipObject();
00147                 items++;
00148         }       
00149 
00150         packWithoutType(items);
00151         
00152         Integer length ;
00153         const unsigned char *listData = writer.getData(&length);
00154 
00155         insertData(listData, length);
00156 }
00157 
00158 
00163 SBW_API void sbwDataBlockWriter::packWithoutType(const sbwDataBlockWriter *const writer)
00164 {
00165         Integer items = 0;
00166         DataBlockReader reader(writer->getReader());
00167 
00168         while (reader.getNextType() != TerminateType)
00169         {
00170                 reader.skipObject();
00171                 items++;
00172         }       
00173 
00174         packWithoutType(items);
00175         
00176         Integer length ;
00177         const unsigned char *listData = writer->getData(&length);
00178 
00179         insertData(listData, length);
00180 }
00181 
00187 SBW_API sbwDataBlockReader *sbwDataBlockWriter::getReader() const
00188 {
00189         sbwDataBlockWriter writer(end + 1); // length + terminator
00190 
00191         writer.insertData(data, end);
00192         writer.packWithoutType((unsigned char)TerminateType);
00193 
00194         return new sbwDataBlockReader(writer.getData(), writer.end);
00195 }
00196 
00203 unsigned char *sbwDataBlockWriter::assembleMessage(sbwDataBlockWriter &header)
00204 {
00205         Integer headerLength ;
00206         const unsigned char *headerData = header.getData(&headerLength);
00207         unsigned char *result = new unsigned char[headerLength + end + 1] ;
00208 
00209         memcpy(result, headerData, headerLength);
00210         memcpy(result + headerLength, data, end);
00211         result[headerLength + end] = (char)TerminateType ;
00212 
00213         return result ;
00214 }
00215 
00228 unsigned char *sbwDataBlockWriter::createInvoke(
00229         unsigned char type, Integer moduleTo, Integer moduleFrom, Integer messageId, Integer service,
00230         Integer method, Integer &length)
00231 {
00232         sbwDataBlockWriter header(25);
00233 
00234         length = end + 26;
00235         header.packWithoutType(length); // extra byte for terminator
00236         header.packWithoutType(moduleTo);
00237         header.packWithoutType(type);
00238         header.packWithoutType(messageId);
00239         header.packWithoutType(moduleFrom);
00240         header.packWithoutType(service);
00241         header.packWithoutType(method);
00242 
00243         return assembleMessage(header);
00244 }
00245 
00257 SBW_API unsigned char *sbwDataBlockWriter::createCall(
00258         Integer moduleTo, Integer moduleFrom, Integer messageId, Integer service, Integer method,
00259         Integer &length)
00260 {
00261         return createInvoke(SBWCallCode, moduleTo, moduleFrom, messageId, service, method, length);
00262 }
00263 
00275 SBW_API unsigned char *sbwDataBlockWriter::createSend(
00276         Integer moduleTo, Integer moduleFrom, Integer service, Integer method,
00277         Integer &length)
00278 {
00279         return createInvoke(SBWSendCode, moduleTo, moduleFrom, ~0, service, method, length);
00280 }
00281 
00290 SBW_API unsigned char *sbwDataBlockWriter::createReply(Integer moduleTo, Integer messageId, Integer &length)
00291 {
00292         sbwDataBlockWriter header(13);
00293 
00294         length = end + 14;
00295         header.packWithoutType(length);
00296         header.packWithoutType(moduleTo);
00297         header.packWithoutType((unsigned char)SBWReplyCode);
00298         header.packWithoutType(messageId);
00299 
00300         return assembleMessage(header);
00301 }
